examples: Bathed in a stark spotlight, a lone ballet dancer takes center stage. Her movements, precise and graceful, tell a story of passion and dedication against the velvet darkness. The scene evokes a sense of intimacy, highlighting the raw emotion and artistry of her performance.
prompt.description: The text prompt used to generate the video
prompt.title: Prompt

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: Video resolution - 480p for faster generation, 720p for balance, 1080p for higher quality

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

image_url.description: The URL of the image used to generate video
image_url.title: Image Url

enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.

seed.description: Random seed to control video generation. Use -1 for random.
seed.title: Seed

camera_fixed.title: Camera Fixed
camera_fixed.description: Whether to fix the camera position

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url
